summary: Email correspondence between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and a Department of Justice official regarding a witness immunity request for an unnamed female witness (Ms. [redacted]). The AUSA attaches a completed immunity application form and offers to discuss further.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sends email with attached witness immunity application form for an unnamed female witness (Ms. [redacted]) to a DOJ official for review.

persons.name: Ms. [redacted]
persons.context: Unnamed female witness who is the subject of the immunity request; described as having involvement in a scheme and having provided proffered information.

connections.description: Prosecutor is handling the witness immunity request on behalf of the witness.

events.title: Witness Immunity Request Correspondence
events.description: Email exchange regarding a witness immunity request for an unnamed female witness (Ms. [redacted]) involved in a scheme.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
U.S. Department of Justice, Criminal Division, Office of Enforcement Operations, Policy & Statutory Enforcement Unit
keyFacts: A witness immunity request is being processed for an unnamed female witness (referred to as 'Ms.') in September 2021.
The witness is described as having involvement in a 'scheme' and having 'proffered' information.
The request is being handled by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and reviewed by the DOJ's Policy & Statutory Enforcement Unit.
A completed witness immunity application form was attached to the email correspondence.
